name: Nightmare Island
description:
Procedurally generated island dungeon crawler.

Objective of the game is to make it the next island by killing the troll and stealing the key while staying alive. You do this by killing other monsters to get power-ups so you don't die. After you get to the next island, you do it again. and again. and again. How far can you go?

WASD or arrow keys to move, space bar to jump, left control to run, x key to open and close menu, p key to lock/unlock cursor, and left click to attack. Right click has an animation, but doesn't do anything as of yet.
